class.name: MediaPipePacket
class.brief_description: A data container in MediaPipe framework.
class.description: A packet in MediaPipe framework is a generic container that can hold data of any type.

method.name: clear
method.description: Clears the content of the packet.

method.name: get
method.description: Gets the content of the packet. Returns [code]null[/code] if the packet is empty or the type is not supported.

method.name: get_type_name
method.description: Returns the type name of the packet. If the packet is empty, or the type is not registered with MediaPipe macros, then empty string is returned.

method.name: is_empty
method.description: Returns [code]true[/code] if the packet is empty.

method.name: set_bool
method.description: Sets packet content with a boolean value.

method.name: set_float
method.description: Sets packet content with a float value.

method.name: set_image
method.description: Sets packet content with [param image] as [code]mediapipe::Image[/code].

method.name: set_image_frame
method.description: Sets packet content with [param image] as [code]mediapipe::ImageFrame[/code].

method.name: set_int32
method.description: Sets packet content with a signed 32-bit integer value.

method.name: set_int64
method.description: Sets packet content with a signed 64-bit integer value.

method.name: set_string
method.description: Sets packet content with a [String] value.

members.member: The timestamp of the packet in microseconds.
